verbose_text: In addition, inhibition of the Akt pathway by LY294002 caused a marginal increase in DEX induced apoptosis, and LY294002 partly eliminated the protective effect of puerarin on DEX induced apoptosis, indicating that puerarin exhibited anti-apoptotic properties, partly dependent on the Akt signaling pathway.
evidence: LY294002 partly eliminated the protective effect of puerarin on DEX-induced apoptosis
